text.div:
LocationTagSearchParameter

Parameter tag:string

Searches based on the tag field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_tag={tag}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: LocationTagSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the tag field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?_tag={tag}
